name: Mario Story
text: I recently moved into a new home where James carpet did my wood floors. I  noticed a few bad spots in my flooring in the upstairs hallway and called them to get them repaired. They said they would come and repair them, but when the guy came the first time he mentioned he did not have the right equipment to fix the flooring. So I reschedule for another day, the appointment was made and they never showed. I called them again and they came to repair the work and I showed them some other spots that needed to be repaired. He said he would come back so I made an appointment and once again they never showed.  Now by this time about 2 months have past by. I called them and now I"m having the hardest time speaking with Scarlett, she is apparantly busy with other customers.  I am disappointed with James Carpet and trust me I will not be using them in the future! If I could put ZERO STARS I would.

name: S Kern
text: Deidre was the most helpful expert I think I've ever had!  And I'm old!  Seriously, this business deserves every bit of a 5 star rating.  They were outstanding in the entire transaction.

name: Tyler Green
text: I came in looking for some kitchen tile and worked with Deidre.  She provided hands down the best customer service I've received over the past several years.  She was attentive, knowledgeable, and followed through when we had an issue with a sample the manufacturer shipped that arrived broken.  I can't say enough good things about my experience with Deidre and would recommend going to her if at all possible.  Thanks!

name: Sue Gorman
text: Deidre was great! I've gotten carpet here multiple times. They have great prices and great service.

name: Candice Musgrove
text: Knowledgeable and friendly staff! A good selection of options and they will definitely take the time with you to ensure you are happy.

name: Claudia Rhen
text: Great sales!  Cooperative!

name: Pamela Cox
text: Our experience with James Carpets was outstanding throughout the entire process. Diedre was helpful and helped me figure out just what we needed, and the crew of Preston, Greg and James Dean was superb! These guys worked hard to make sure we were happy with the job, even taking the extra time to make sure all of our floors were "squeak-free" before installing the new carpeting. This is our second 5 Star experience with James Carpets, and we highly recommend them to anyone who wants an excellent product and terrific customer service.

name: Jeffrey and Morgan Thomas
text: That's was the easiest most enjoyable experience we could have ever hoped for in picking flooring and tile. Scarlett is the best. Thank you so much. We recommend James Carpets over everyone.

name: lawton wade
text: Have used James Flooring 3-4 times and in different houses for both hardwoods and carpet.  The owner is a good man and his folks do really good work at the best prices Ive found . James Flooring also follows up to make sure you are pleased with their work - its surprising how few businesses do this. These folks are the best Ive found.

name: Brier Armstrong
text: Friendly people. A way better deal and carpet from Lowe's or Home Depot!

name: leslie sherban
text: This is my third remodel and I wouldn't have wanted to do it without James Carpets. I love how friendly everyone is and how fast and effortless they made the job. Thank you!

name: Freedom Found Farm
text: Excellent customer service...great people and friendly too!!!

name: liberty Kincannon
text: Great people and have a lot of options. Will go here over anywhere else for my flooring needs.

name: Ashley D
text: Alan helped me order my flooring. He is so wonderful! Thank you! Great price!

name: M K
text:
Disappointing service.

Our tiling work is only 1/2 way complete so I cannot review the work only that the workers who came to our home have been very nice and my complaint has nothing to do with them.

Our tile work was supposed to be completed yesterday 10/8.  It did not get complete because some of the wood did not match our floor (100% understandable!) We were told they would be back this morning to complete the work.  My husband takes the morning off of work and we have a photographer scheduled at 1pm to take photos to put our house on the market.  The morning passes and we never hear from anyone.  Finally my husband messages the worker directly and he said that they erew coming this afternoon instead.  Someone from James Carpets was supposed to reach out to us.  My husband has to take the full day off work and now we need to wait to put our house on the market.  Here's where the problem happened:

I call the store to see what happened.  When I explain the situation to the lady who answered her reply was "well, those phones fail us all the time dont they?  Is there anything else you need?" I asked for a Manager to call me. Someone called about an hour later and his response was almost unbelievable.  He explained that they had to change the wood. Great, but the issue here is that no one communicated with us that there would be a delay.  He talks in circles for a few minutes first blaming us, then the workers then he says he has "no idea why they didn't come this morning" ?? What?  We all understand why they didn't come the issue is with why someone didn't communicate this to us which caused a major inconvenience.

I do not recommend this company.  Good customer service is NOT difficult at all but obviously not something that they care about.

name: Noa Williams
text: Our builder installed hardwoods that was purchased from this company almost three years ago . The hardwoods were a terrible quality and extremely  difficult to maintain. After using the recommended products our floors got worse and worse. I reached out to James Carpet for help and the staff was rude and unwilling to understand my issues. I will never go with a company or builder that uses James Carpet for any of their products. It's going to be a very costly problem to rid our home of their terrible hardwoods.

name: Amanda Webster Hays
text:
Great service, affordable prices, beautiful installation!

I have worked for two separate builders spanning over the last several years, and both builders exclusively use James Carpets as their flooring & backsplash vendor.. and with great reason!  They offer the largest amount of color/material selections in their showroom with an extensive amount of knowledge for each type of product.  Scarlett, namely, has been such a big help in business and personal flooring decisions.  Not only is she extremely knowledgeable with all of the many products they offer, but she is also forthright with sharing extensive information on color variations (photos, additional samples, etc).  My husband and I also hired them to install tile, vinyl, hardwood, & backsplash into my personal home, and I'm beyond happy with their prices and completed work!

I would recommend James Carpets to anyone!!

name: Corie Galloway
text: Best flooring store in town!

name: Ric Patterson
text: Great people

text: Very nice   good price s 😂😂😂😂😂

name: Gregory Gray
text: Good people

name: Ken Lyons
text: They have a huge showroom with hundreds of flooring styles and samples.  The customer service from selecting your flooring through installation process is top notch.  I enjoyed my experience with Town & County Flooring in Troy, Al

name: Latoya Smith
text: I highly recommend Town and Country Flooring in Troy, AL. They were very friendly and prompt. It's very rare these days that you get great customer service and awesome service! The contractors Mike and Sharon, along with their crew did a fantastic job! I love my flooring!!

name: Robert Smith
text: You couldn't find a more pleasant and knowledgable company to deal with; don't be fooled by the size of the store.

name: Brenda Colvin-Cheathem
text: Very helpful

name: John Briscoe
text: Purchased tile and plumbing from Pro-Source outstanding experience. Scottie English was sales person she made it flow smooth and easy like purchased should.

name: Proud Parent
text:
I bought cabinets from ProSource at the end of August. The date of install would be Sept 1st - 5th. I am still waiting on Sept 25th for the cabinets to arrive. No date can be given... I have told them I am waiting to sell the house and the cabinets are costing me the mortgage. How long will I have to wait? No one can tell me. I have several interested buyers in the home right now. This company does not care about you or your project.

***UPDATE SEPT 29TH***
I had the pleasure to work with Trent a ProSource employee. He was great to find the answers for me that I did not have. I had the company delivering the cabinets calling me providing me updates directly. As a customer if I could go through ProSource myself I would. I appreciate the follow through.

resp.text:
Hello,
Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. Client and member satisfaction is our top priority and we’re happy we were able to get in contact with you to discuss finding a resolution. We appreciate your feedback and communication with the showroom as well as your patience and understanding.

name: Brad McClellan
text: Large selection. Not pushy salespeople. Knowledgeable.

name: Wanda Monti
text: Very friendly staff, made sure I was informed on each flooring choice I was looking at. Made sure I understood what type of flooring was recommended for Bathroom and Kitchen and what is water proof and what is not. This is where you need to go for your flooring if you are not sure if you're getting what you need.

name: Vincent Martin
text: Everything that go on a surplus flooring reasonable prices great workers employers who are very attentive to detail can give you measurements help you in any way possible did it with the decision that you have to make

name: Taquila Johnson
text: This place has great flooring and home materials

name: Marcus Bogus
text: Good

name: Alba Martinez
text:
(Translated by Google) Great thanks place alabama water park

(Original)
Excelente gracias lugar alabama parke acuático

name: Tom Mclemore
text:
I have used Ray on three homes and he is absolutely the best. Not sure what a parking lot issue has to do with a business's quality of workmanship.
The prices are fair, service is great and their selection is huge.

name: Trisha Smith
text: We renovated our Grandmother’s house last year and used R&D flooring to install our flooring throughout our house. These guys are the best! If you are building or renovating a home, go down and speak with Ray. You will not be disappointed!

name: Amy justice
text: We were so pleased with R&D Flooring for our recent renovation.  Excellent selection,  great customer service,  exceptional installation crew! Thanks,  Ray and Crew!!

resp.text: Thanks Amy it was a pleasure help you out!!

name: ray langston
text: I am the owner of this place and would like to explain the bad reviews. These were truck drivers that were tresspassing and got their feelings hurt and left bad reviews. Neither of the 3 have ever stepped foot inside my store

name: kyle
text:
If you support truckers (the back bone of America, the ones that bring you food and all the essentials you need) do not shop here. They will boot you and say you owe them 500 bucks to remove it. They say they have signs up to warn truckers to not park or turn around in their lot but the sign is 100 feet off the road and against the building, you can't see that till you are already in the lot. The other 4 signs they have are 1"×2" signs you can't read till you are right on top of them and from what I could see those only said no parking. If you really wanted to till truckers not to use your lot you should put your sign front and center next to the roadway where people can see it.

They clearly can't make enough money on flooring so they have to prey on truck driver to make their mortgage. This place is a cash grab, and a place of extortion.

resp.text: Again sir I have had nothing but problems from disrespectful truckers since I opened my business. If you can’t read a 4 foot by 8 foot sign asking you to not park or turn around there then maybe you are in the wrong line of work. Maybe an optometrist visit is in your future.

name: Charles Wright
text: It's a sad company that preys on unsuspecting truck drivers.

resp.text: If this truck driver could learn to read and had a little respect for others property then this truck driver would have not had any problems. There are 5 signs telling truck drivers they cant trespass on this property yet some think laws and rules do not apply to them. When a driver knowingly tresspasses is he really unsuspecting?

name: Nick Kcin
text: No good, would not recommend. I was sold on the panel flooring we have being pulled up to repair the areas were gaps were located, this wasn't done. All the crew did was squirt glue into the gaps and jam them forward to join them. This resulted in not all the gaps being fixed, and the ones glued a few of them have mounds of dried glue sticking out.  The flooring that was placed was fine, but the 1/4 round wasn't painted/stained on the cut ends, the transitions were nailed in (which is fine) leaving  sharp nail heads sticking up which would easily cut a foot. I guess this job would have been ok if it was cheap but it was not.

resp.text: We're sorry to hear this. We know that our team went out and tried to fix your older flooring but put in new flooring that you loved. Please give us a call and we can help you out, thanks!

name: Beth Eddings
text: I cannot share enough good things about our experiences with Hill's. The quality of their work is wonderful and they stand behind it. We purchased some beautiful tile from them in 2016 transforming our kitchen and bath, and then in 2018 returned to purchase all new bedroom carpet before our daughter was born. Each time we've been presented with affordable options that are still of high quality and any time someone we know is looking for flooring I recommend Hill's in Hueytown. They offer all the same products as flooring places in Birmingham but at a fraction of the price due to being a small family shop.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your lovely review, Beth! Come see us anytime and we're so pleased you're happy!

name: Debbie Kleist
text: I highly recommend Hill's Carpet and Floor Coverings. The technicians arrived exactly when they told me they would, were experienced and efficient in their work and finished flooring my entire house in 2 days. They were neat and courteous as they worked. My floor looks beautiful and the price was reasonable. If you need flooring work in Hueytown, Hill's is the company to call.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Mrs.Kleist! Come back and see us anytime!

name: Greg Marlin
text: I've been using Mr. Hill since the early '90's. Prices are always reasonable, products are great, & installs always go well. I would highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for your review!

name: Diane C
text: I had a terrible experience and would not recommend or use them again. A 1 day installation turned into 5 visits to my home, they have not corrected everything they messed up, and they destroyed all the door frames. They tell you they've have been in business for a long time, but the owners are not the same, and neither is the quality of work.

resp.text: We have been patient in our reply and have decided it is time to respond since you will not take our repeated calls. We understand your frustration with the initial installation of your flooring which resulted in our decision to terminate the original contractor. Obviously we were frustrated as well and we spoke with you at length over the phone about this. The errors he made have been corrected.  You called again with concern that the carpet was not fastened correctly in one area and, though after inspecting we determined there wasn't a problem, we still agreed to have a contractor come and re-stretch it in an effort to resolve your concern.  We disagree that "they destroyed all the door frames".  Yes, there was some slight damage done to some of the door frames but they were far from being "destroyed".  Your salesman offered to repaint those areas himself but you declined.  We have gone as far as discounting your invoice three times in an effort to appease you.  We have a two year labor warranty and we stand behind it.  The quality of work performed by subsequent contractors to correct the errors of the first was excellent.  Hill's Carpet & Floor Coverings has been in business at our main location since 1986.  The original owner sold the business to his nephew some 9 years ago and the original owner remains active in the business.  We are proud of our history of serving the greater Birmingham area by offering quality products, competitive prices, and professional installation.  We're proud of and humbled by so many positive reviews on line.  We recognize that the original installation fell short of the last standard and we have tried diligently to work with you to resolve your remaining issue.

name: Kelly Finnegan
text: We chose to go with Hill’s over a box store like Home Depot or Lowes and we are so glad we did. They were so incredibly helpful throughout the whole process. They let us take home several samples until we found the right one. They explained the different types of carpets and the benefits of each one. Mr Hill personally came out and measured and quoted the room. Installers were right on time and worked quickly and did such a wonderful job. We love our carpet and plan to use Hill’s in the future when we redo our kitchen flooring.

resp.text: Wow! Thank you so much for your honest review! We really do take pride in doing our best to bring beauty to your home without the hassle. Remember us and come back to see us anytime! Thanks again!!

name: Maria Holmes
text:
FYI LONG REVIEW: I originally contacted Hill's back in Aug to refinish our hardwood floors. Very pleasant experience with Clark with setting up my consultation. Cullen came out and did the consultation with me and my husband. It went well, and the price was very reasonable. He advised me that he would email me the proposal and to call him when we were ready.

I waited for the email but never received it. However, I still called a week later and let him know we were ready to schedule but that I still haven't received the proposal email. I didn't feel comfortable calling to pay my deposit over the phone without a proposal. He wasn't at the office when I called but was going to call once he got settled. When he finally called, I wasn't available but I still didn't get a proposal email.

So I waited before calling back. Then Clark called and left a msg asking if my consultation went well and if I was ready to schedule. At that time I was not because I wanted the proposal on paper with the amount I was quoted. Never heard back.

So I called again Monday, 10/12 and spoke with a gentleman about scheduling (yes I was still willing to use this company because the price I was quoted was the best). He got my name and address and tried to look up an invoice or proposal and guess what, there was none!! He asked who did my consultation and I told him Cullen. He said he would get him to call me. Days later, I'm still waiting on my call.

The other 2 companies I've contacted this week have been very responsive and gotten me proposals within the same day of the consultation. I'd rather pay the extra $ for great customer service and communication.

resp.text: Ms. Holmes, your experience with our company is very regrettable.  We strive to establish a meaningful relationship with all our customers resulting in a satisfying experience throughout the purchasing process.  It is unfortunate that in your case we failed to do that and we apologize.  Having been in business in the greater Birmingham area since 1987 we're very humbled and gratified by the excellent rankings we have on social media on Facebook, Google, and the Better Business Bureau.  We appreciate your candidness and again, apologize for not exceeding your expectations.  Your review is a reminder of the importance of delivering a satisfying experience for each and every potential customer every day.

name: S
text: After years of contemplation I finally decided to get my floors redone. I went with the Mohawk LVP and am thoroughly pleased with the installation and customer service received from Hill's Carpet and Flooring (Helena). I am pretty particular about everything, and Cullen (sales) was very patient with my indecisiveness and worked with me on figuring out what would make me happy. The install crew was prompt, super efficient, and extremely professional.  They exceeded my expectations, especially with cleaning up, and returning things to their original place. If you want good old fashioned customer service then you should definitely check them out!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your awesome review and for being such an awesome customer! Come and see us anytime!

name: Chris Jennings
text: Excellent customer service from the estimate appointment till the completion of the job. Great prices and excellent workers. Very pleased.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review!
Thanks for the review!

name: Emmanuel Lewis
text: These guys are fantastic. 👌 Just had my floors put in! Nice easy and to the point. No B.S. and the free estimate and consultation was just what I needed with my busy schedule. A++

resp.text: Thanks for the review Mr. Lewis!

name: Candie L Walton
text: Great Company! Bill has been good to work with concerning my flooring issues.  Guys came out and did a superb job installing my new carpet.  I will definitely go back to Hill's Carpet and Flooring with all my flooring needs

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and for such a great review! It was a pleasure working with you! 😃

text: Hill's recently installed Milliken carpet on our stairs and master bedroom closets.  They also installed Harris wood flooring in our upstairs bonus room. Their installation crews are professionals, doing a great job. Thank you so much! I definitely recommend them.

name: Bill Green
text: Great place!

name: frank sebert
text:
Please do yourself and choose wisely before using Hill's, I used the Helena store and can not and would not use or recommend any Hill's seeing how they all the same owner and installers.
I will tell you about my experience, The carpet is nice and seems to be installed well, this is not where the problem is and if you enjoy paying someone to rub paint off your walls and base boards then tell you" well that just happens" then you have found your place. My wife and I spent over an hour sweeping dusting and vacuuming after the installers left angry and in a hurry, when i told them I expected them to vacuum and clean what mess they made during the install, just got in the van and left?!
I will tell you the salesman did at least get me a whole pint of paint so I could repaint what HILL'S CARPET should have taken care of, there wasn't even an offer to say "hey how bout we at least knock of $20.00 or $25.00 for your time and trouble." Granted by what it would have taken to make this right it isn't a major deal, but do you really want to spend your hard earned money and have to clean up and paint a house you just cleaned and painted? Then be disrespected and talked down to in your own home? Please make a better choice than I did. There are many carpet stores in the area and I know most will appreciate your business,
I can tell you for a fact unforunately that HILL'S CARPET will not.

resp.text: We're sorry for the bad service at the time but you may call us at our office anytime. Also thank you for rating honestly. We've recently expanded our showroom in Helena to display a lot more product lines which greatly expands choices and our crews are amazing! Come back and give us another chance to wow you! Thanks!

name: Landon K
text:
Get customer service, great prices, and easy to work with.
Took several SPC and carpet samples home to find exactly what we wanted, worked out a price we were happy with on the flooring, picked it up when were ready for it, and had it installed by a local contractor. We have had the flooring for almost a year now and are completely happy with the quality of flooring we purchased. I am also looking to use them again, but this time on a commercial project.

name: Taylor Martin
text: Friendly, knowledgeable and professional staff were very helpful from the moment I walked in the door. They have a great selection of flooring and very reasonably priced. I went with some cool looking LVT and can’t wait to get it installed. It was a pleasure doing business with you. Thanks again!

name: Mary Evans
text:
Mary is the best! They are so patient and helpful!
Great prices too!

name: david loeser
text:
I normally do not do reviews but this place does not practice good business. They are not for the customer but only want to make a sell. My wife had a list of exactly what was needed from the person who was installing the flooring in our house and she showed the list to the people who work there. They showed my wife flooring and she picked the color she likes. Not knowing the type of floor was wrong. Remember these are the “experts”. We unloaded all the floor at the house the next morning the person installing asked why they gave us the wrong stuff. We ended up having to return the floor which we would have purchased the right floor from them but they charged us a 20% restocking fee because they sold us the wrong floor. Knowing what was asked for and needed as my wife showed pictures of the subfloor.

Nonetheless they lost our business and stole 20% because they should have fit that bill due to their lack of of professionalism and customer service.

If you want the cheapest price maybe they are the place to go, who knows. But if you want customer service and want to be sure you are getting the best product for your needs this is definitely not the place to go.

resp.text: Yes they did give us a list of materials they needed. On that list were the items that they needed for a remodel and there was a quantity of flooring that they needed not a specific floor but just a quantity. We asked her what type of floor she was looking for so we helped her get a waterproof floor that she asked for. She had over 100 options to choose, yes we have a great variety at great low prices. Theirs was a 5mm/20mil wear layer at only $1.49 Sf by the way. She even took a sample of the entire piece. When they came to return the floor the installer came with her and he said that he seen the piece when they brought it to their home, he said that he seen the sample  when he was at the store. Why he did not mention he could not install that type of floor in that house we do not know (this was before the purchase was made). We gave her the floor she chose not a wrong one. She also read and signed a receipt that she still has that specifically says **no refunds** that’s why we let people take samples so they make sure they take the correct floor for their home. As many people here know that this is a family and USMC veteran owned and operated store and we treat people with respect. We have extensive knowledge about flooring and helped her get a floor that was waterproof that they did not want to install. We then proceed calling our supplier which does take returns at a 20% cost. Which they claim we stole but we have to give that to our supplier to return the floor just like any other store that charges restocking fees for special orders. We tried to help them and get their money even though we do not take returns and they accepted the 20% from the supplier. We never sold a wrong floor. The customer saw and took a sample and we gave her that exact floor that all the names and numbers match to the sample to the receipt and to all the boxes they took. We never sold a wrong floor. We’re just following store policies that she was well aware of when she signed and payed for her floor.

name: Kristi watts
text: Awesome, super helpful folks. They went above and beyond to help us.  Vanessa, Mary, Chris and David rocked! Will be going back for our new build.

name: Kelly Pennell
text: I give Scott 5 stars for great service, but overall Pro Source gets 3 stars for communication. Was told our tile would arrive in 5 days, but it's now day 15. I understand that they can't control delivery, but they should contact their customers to let them know about changes.

resp.text:
Hi Kelly,
Thanks so much for taking the time to leave a review. Reviews are integral to our continuous growth as a showroom and client and member satisfaction are our top priority. We are disappointed to hear about the problem with the delivery of your tile from the supplier and apologize for any inconvenience.

name: richard chambers
text: Premier service - they recently went out of their way to help ship an order when it did not arrive on time and helped to save our project timeline. Great company, I highly recommend you giving then a call or stopping by and asking for Allan.

resp.text:
Hi Richard,
Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We're so pleased to hear you enjoyed working with our showroom team and received fantastic service. We appreciate your feedback and can't wait to have you in the store again soon. Take care!

name: Carolyn Hasser
text: The people there were so helpful and had exactly what I wanted. They helped me with ideas and concepts. The prices were in line with what is available out there.

resp.text:
Hi Carolyn,
Thanks for the review. We're so happy to hear you enjoyed working with our showroom team. We truly appreciate your feedback and hope to have you in the store again soon. Take care!

name: John Doss
text: This place is awesome they have a huge show room with a very wide variety of selections. The Price is is wonderful, and Aly is an Amazing sales lady she has more knowledge of products, installation techniques, and designs than most flooring contractors I have met. be sure and go by and visit ProSource you'll be impressed like we were. PS I'm a contractor not a store employee.

name: Jennifer van Arcken
text: Really like the store. Lots of options to choose from. Nicole was very responsive on the cabinet design and got the order submitted when completed in a timely manner. I would recommend.

resp.text:
Hi Jennifer,
Thank you for the review. We're happy to hear you were pleased with your visit to the showroom. We value your feedback and look forward to your next visit. Take care!

name: Keith Quackenbush
text:
I walked in the showroom and was blown away by the selection.  After I walked in I was sooooo impressed by the service.

What I will say is that this place is not 'cheap'... if you want 'cheap' 99 cent tile or carpet... go somewhere that sells cheap stuff.

BUT! If you want builders grade, or really cool stuff at great low prices.... then they are well worth a visit! Ober 50,000 sample in a gorgous well lit showroom.

BEST flooring, plumbing and cabinet showroom I have ever seen.

name: Seghers Pickard
text: Overabundance of choices! Jeff was a great help, plus he has a really good eye for color. I was able to pick out carpet, luxury vinyl plank, kitchen cabinets, tile backsplash and grout, and countertops. So many choices of such beautiful products. Can't say enough about this one-stop-shopping hidden gem in Pelham!

resp.text:
Hi Seghers,
Thanks so much for the feedback, We really appreciate you taking the time to leave a review! We pride ourselves on having the best quality materials with plenty of choices and are thrilled to hear you enjoyed working alongside Jeff. Come back anytime!

name: Henry Strevy
text: They have the best and they are very nice and polite

resp.text:
Hi Henry,
Thanks for the review. We're happy to hear your visit to the showroom was a success and our team was able to be of service. We value your feedback and always look forward to new projects. Take care!

name: Ben
text: ProSource has been so easy to work with. They give great advice and don't rush like the more well known franchises and big box stores. I will use them again when I do my next renovation.

resp.text:
Hi Ben,
Thanks for the review. We're elated to hear you enjoy working with our showroom and that the process was easy going. We appreciate your feedback and always look forward to new projects. Come back and see us anytime, take care!

name: Jeff Pierce
text: So happy we found this place! Prices and quality were outstanding but the help we received from Christoper, one of the family members that own it, was invaluable. Although they do a lot of business with pro contractors, Christopher took the time to help us (DIYers) select cabinets, a soaker tub and fixtures. We highly recommend ProSource! Jeff

resp.text:
Hi Jeff,
Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We're so pleased to hear you enjoyed utilizing our showroom and working alongside Christopher. We appreciate your awesome review and look forward to your next project!

name: George Sadowski
text: If you have not shopped at pro source then you need to. The selection by far is the best in the Birmingham area the store room is beautiful as well as the selections of products. I must say the staff is excellent. I highly recommend that you stop in even if you are not building or remodeling and once you do, you will go home with ideas so that you will want to remodel.

resp.text: Hi George, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and hope to see you again soon. Take care!

name: Barbara Klein
text:
I had the opportunity of consulting, with Chris at Pro Source.  He was very patient, friendly and a good listener, of what products I was interested in. I had a kitchen flood that affected three rooms, with flooring needing tile/ carpeting, as well as, . backsplash tile. He had a wealth of knowledge, of all their materials and shared advice on my possible interests.  I was given many samples to take home to see
the colors, with my lighting and existing colors I was trying to coordinate together. I would highly recommend Pro Source materials  and Chris making my remodeling a good experience.

resp.text: Hi Barbara, thank you for taking the time to leave your feedback. We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and will pass along your kind words to Chris.

name: Mitch Jones
text: We needed to remodel a rental property and had gotten several quotes from different people before going to ProSource.  ProSource had the BEST prices AND they were the most eager to help us find what we needed within our budget.  Christopher and his staff are FANTASTIC!! Great showroom too, highly recommend them!

resp.text: Hi Mitch, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience and will pass along your kind words to Christopher. Take care!

name: Brenda Lynn
text: ProSource is a fabulous place to work. The Pancners are great people to work for and with. The other employees are great, too. It is a happy place to work and shop.

resp.text: Hi Brenda, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback!

name: Tim Johnston
text: Hands down the best,cleanest, well lit showroom in the Greater Birmingham area... Great selection of flooring, cabinets countertops and K&B!  The service is excellent and the staff is friendly and knowledgeable and really cares about getting you the look you want!

resp.text: Hi Tim, thank you so much for the positive review! We are glad that we can offer such a large selection to our customers. Come back on the next project!

name: Joy Cannon
text: Jessica and Christopher were so friendly, helpful and patient.  They made the daunting task of choosing from so many products easier and fun!

resp.text: Hi Joy, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a positive experience and will pass along your kind words to Jessica and Christopher! Take care!

name: Sue Smith
text: Pro Source in Pelham has an outstanding selection & the staff is top notch.  Special hat tip to Cody Barrett, my account manager.  He has had the patience of a saint & couldn't be more helpful!  Can't say enough good things about this Pro Source.

resp.text: Hi Sue, thank you so much for the positive. Review we are so happy that we could help you with your project needs. See you on the next one!

name: Amanda Larson
text: This place is wonderful.  Everyone who works here is so helpful.  ProSource is perfect for all your flooring needs.

resp.text: Hi Amanda, thank you so much for the 5-star rating. We really appreciate it. See you again soon!

name: Matt Lewandowski
text: Employees were knowledgeable and helped us through our project, specifically Mr.Chris Pancner. We have a home in Fairhope and had our product shipped to their other location in Pensacola. I was able to pick up the material, which was wrapped perfectly. The warehouse guys were friendly and made sure I had everything I needed as well. Will be sending all I can to you guys, thank you so much!

resp.text: Hi Matt, thank you so much for the positive review. We will make sure to pass on the compliments to the rest of the showroom - they will be thrilled! See you again soon.

name: Kate Victory
text: Beautiful showroom with tons of selections! Instead of searching all over town, I was able to get the majority of my material here!

resp.text: Hi Kate, thank you so much for the positive review. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to working on our next project together!

name: george pancner
text: Beautiful showroom, knowledgeable staff, 40,000 selections and lowest prices in town.

resp.text: Hi George, thank you so much for positive review. We are happy that we can offer a wide range of products at low wholesale prices. Hope to see you soon!

name: Taylor Reed
text: They have a beautiful showroom with lots of options and a helpful staff to answer all of your questions.

resp.text: Hi Taylor, thank you for taking the time to provide your feedback! We are pleased to hear that you had a great experience. Take care!

name: Jessica Richardson
text: Awesome selection, tons of choices, and super helpful staff!

resp.text: Hi Jessica, so good to hear that we could help with your project. Thanks for the positive review and hope to see you again!
